duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage Procurement and Purchasing Strategies for various direct packaging materials.
Research and negotiate vendor agreements and contracts.
Review and report market trends to procurement team and stakeholders.
Establish and manage key supplier relations and supplier negotiations.
Work cross-functionally with other departments and executives within the company to execute short and long-term objectives.
Work as a liaison with Procurement and R&D team.
Provide leadership to the Procurement Team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, Supply Chain, or related field
